Fireworks Engine  v1.5
Lightweight Sandbox Game Engine using OpenGL for additional Customisation and Quick Prototyping
 

- a -

  • Advance : fireworks::graphics::Character

- b -

  • backgroundColor : fireworks::graphics::Window
  • Bearing : fireworks::graphics::Character
  • bodyType : fireworks::physics::RigidBody2D

- c -

  • color : fireworks::graphics::Label , fireworks::graphics::Sprite , fireworks::graphics::VertexData
  • columns : fireworks::maths::mat4
  • components : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • componentType : fireworks::components::Component

- d -

  • density : fireworks::physics::RigidBody2D

- e -

  • elements : fireworks::maths::mat4

- f -

  • fixedRotation : fireworks::physics::RigidBody2D
  • flippedX : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • flippedY : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • font : fireworks::graphics::Label
  • fontPath : fireworks::graphics::Font
  • fontSize : fireworks::graphics::Font
  • frame : fireworks::graphics::Sprite
  • frameRate : fireworks::graphics::Sprite
  • friction : fireworks::physics::RigidBody2D

- g -

  • gain : fireworks::audio::AudioClip
  • Gravity : PhysicsManager
  • gravityScale : fireworks::physics::RigidBody2D

- m -

  • m_BufferID : fireworks::graphics::RenderBuffer
  • m_Camera2D : fireworks::graphics::Renderer2D

  • m_FragPath : fireworks::graphics::Shader
  • m_Position : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • m_Primitive2D : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • m_Renderables : fireworks::graphics::Layer
  • m_Renderer : fireworks::graphics::Layer
  • m_Rotation : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • m_Shader : fireworks::graphics::BatchRenderer2D
  • m_ShaderID : fireworks::graphics::Shader
  • m_Size : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • m_Texture : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • m_TransformationBack : fireworks::graphics::Renderer2D
  • m_TransformationStack : fireworks::graphics::Renderer2D
  • m_UV : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • m_VertPath : fireworks::graphics::Shader

- n -

  • name : fireworks::components::ComponentType

- o -

  • objectID : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D

- p -

  • PhysicsWorld : PhysicsManager
  • pitch : fireworks::audio::AudioClip
  • position : fireworks::graphics::Label , fireworks::graphics::Sprite

- r -

  • resitution : fireworks::physics::RigidBody2D
  • rotation : fireworks::graphics::Sprite

- s -

  • shader : fireworks::graphics::Renderable2D
  • Size : fireworks::graphics::Character
  • size : fireworks::graphics::Sprite

  • text : fireworks::graphics::Label
  • TextureID : fireworks::graphics::Character

  • typeID : fireworks::components::ComponentType

  • uv : fireworks::graphics::VertexData

  • vertex : fireworks::graphics::VertexData

  • w : fireworks::maths::vec4

- x -

  • x : fireworks::maths::vec2 , fireworks::maths::vec3 , fireworks::maths::vec4
